Summary: Bridge MauiReactor content into native DataTemplate properties using TemplateHost.
Remarks: Many third‑party controls require a native DataTemplate (e.g., popup content, item templates). Wrap a MauiReactor render function with TemplateHost to produce the native element and assign it to the control's TemplateProperty. Keep templates stateless and drive them from component state/props; handle events to update state rather than mutating native controls directly.
